page.title: 07PORTHMADOG EDUCATION
page.content: In the area are two primary schools {Ysgol Borth-y-Gest}and{Ysgol Eifion {Wyn.}Children are admitted to the nursery classes at the age of three. In Eifion Wyn there are 128 pupils in the infants section and 132 in the juniors.Up to the age of 7 the main language used is Welsh because the children need a good basis in their mother-tongue.From the age of 7 the children are taught in English and Welsh so that they will become bilingual.The subjects taught are: reading,writing,maths,painting,music (harp,violin,recorder),handwork,local history and geography,computers, English and Welsh.There are 11 teachers at the school,including the headmaster and a teacher in charge of the infants,plus 3 peripatetic teachers for music.
